title: INDISTRACTABLE: Staying Focused in a World of Distractions
description: Nir Eyal’s last book, “Hooked,” taught Silicon Valley how to make addictive technology. In his new book, “Indistractable,” he gives you the tools to take back control of your attention and your life.
